meanings.definition: The quality or state of being delicious.
meanings.sent1: The deliciousnesses of the cake made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The bakery is known for its deliciousnesses.
meanings.sent3: The deliciousnesses of the ice cream were so tempting that I couldn't resist.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking always brings a sense of deliciousnesses to the table.
meanings.sent5: The deliciousnesses of the freshly baked bread filled the room with a mouth-watering aroma.

meanings.sent1: We indulged in the deliciousnesses of the chocolate truffles.
meanings.sent2: The menu is full of various deliciousnesses to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was filled with all sorts of deliciousnesses for our outing.
meanings.sent4: The deliciousnesses of the fruit salad were a refreshing treat on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: She always surprises us with new deliciousnesses to try at her dinner parties.
